t.t-value: o.user_id.lang if o.type in ('in_invoice', 'in_refund') else o.partner_id.lang

div.t-if: o.date_due and o.type == 'out_invoice' and o.state in ('open', 'in_payment', 'paid')
div.name: due_date

tr.t-att-class: 'bg-200 font-weight-bold o_line_section' if line.display_type == 'line_section' else 'font-italic o_line_note' if line.display_type == 'line_note' else ''

div.p: Please use the following communication for your payment :

span.p: This invoice will be paid using direct debit and is only sent for informative purposes.
Please do not pay it manually, the payment will be asked to your bank to be processed automatically.

t.t-esc: partner_bank.bank_id.name + ('' if not partner_bank.bank_id.bic else ' (' + partner_bank.bank_id.bic + ')')

p.strong: Scan me with your banking app.
The SEPA QR Code informations are not set correctly.

field.name: x_studio_type_de_robinet_sur_la_poche
field.string: Type de robinet sur la poche

field.name: x_studio_indication_prix_de_cession_au_l
field.string: Indication prix de cession au L

t.t-if: doc.partner_shipping_id == doc.partner_invoice_id and doc.partner_invoice_id != doc.partner_id or doc.partner_shipping_id != doc.partner_invoice_id

t.strong: Adresse de facturation et de livraison :

tr.t-att-class: 'bg-200 font-weight-bold o_line_section' if line.display_type == 'line_section' else 'font-italic o_line_note' if line.display_type == 'line_note' else ''
